text:
- The BMW crew is the world
leading premium manufacturer
of automobiles and motorcycles.

In 2020, the BMW crew sold
more than 2.3 million vehicles

that are produced and
assembled in 31 plants
in 15 countries,

with the help of more
than 120,000 employees.
(upbeat music)

- Translations are key
to provide information

to our customers, retailers,
suppliers, partners,
and also our employees.

- With suppliers and
production all over the world,

we have to provide our
documents in numerous languages.
- The automobile industry,
is in a remarkable transformation.

One example of how we are
using AI in business processes
is machine translation.
(upbeat music)

- The infrastructure concept
of AWS provides us a reliable

and robust platform, which
easily scales for our needs.

Amazon Translate does not
only provide the translation,

but also the possibility to
customize the translation
with our own data,

with the feature called Amazon
Active Custom Translation.

We can not only customize
the translation itself,
but also the whole process around it.
(upbeat music)
- Without this translation service,
the worldwide production of BMW cars,

motorcycles as well as
Minis and Rolls-Royce
would not be possible.

- [Worker] Machine translation
speeds up translation,

and the last year we have
seen tremendous improvements.

- We are translating
German repair instructions

into more than 30
languages around the world.
(upbeat music)
- With the help of AWS,

we were able to reduce our
translation time, but over 75%,
besides the time reduction,
we were able to improve significantly

the quality of our
translation for our use case.
(upbeat music)

- We want to provide
synchronous translation,
not only in the vehicle,
but along all our business processes

so that employees can translate
information on the fly.

- Amazon Web Services Translate
will leave us an opportunity

to expand our sort of support
for you due to the fact

that Amazon Translate can
translate quick and easy.

We'll got the translations
much faster at lower cost.
(upbeat music)

- We strongly believed
that AI has the power
to transform the BMW crew.
- With the help of AWS,

we want to bring
translation at the BMW crew
to the next level.
(upbeat music ending)
